title: Unboxing the new HP Elite Dragonfly G2
author: sponsored
summary: Hands on experience with the new convertible that breaks all the rules
article: The HP Elite Dragonfly G2 pairs design with performance in a convertible that breaks all the rules. The case is CNC machined from magnesium with lightweight precision craftsmanship and a starting weight at less than 1 kg. The striking Dragonfly Blue, finishes and accents and incorporates recycled materials, including ocean-bound plastics.
Here’s Tefty with a first hand impression of the Elite Dragonfly G2.
Features audio by Bang Olufsen, with updated AI Based HP Noise Cancellation software.
Elite Dragonfly Max features four wide-range mics, a 5 MP + IR camera,to maximize your collaboration experience
The HP Eye Ease display with blue light technology with Eyesafe® certification reduces eyestrain.
For more information on pricing and availability visit HP.com
